naslov: Split, okolica, vila s bazenom i pogledom na more (prodaja)
opis: NOVO U PRODAJI!!! POSLOVNA PRILIKA!!! Na parcel površine 521 m2 smještena je jedinstvena vila s velikim bazenom i prekrasnim pogledom na Split, more i otoke. Tlocrtna  površina vile iznosi 100 m2,  a proteže se na tri etaže, prizemlje, prvi i drugi kat (ukupno 300 m2 stambene površine). U prizemlju vile (100 m2) se nalazi tradicionalna konoba, bio sauna, opremljena teretana te  soba za zabavu s biljarom i pikadom. Konobu, s unutarnjim kaminom, je dizajnirao gospodin Todorić, poznati hrvatski dizajner interijera i slikar te se u konobi nalazi i njegova slika “Razigrani konji”. Teretana i konoba imaju izlaz na veliku terasu uz bazen. Bazen je površine 40 m2 te jedinstvenog i posebnog dizajna, a okružuju ga, s jedne strane   prostor za sjedenje kojeg krasi zidna slika Bacchusa, zatim na drugom zidu velika zidna slika Posejdona, a s juga sunčalište s pogledom na more i otoke. Okoliš je zasađen raznim mediteranskim biljem i palmama, ima i vanjski roštilj, pa Vam okruženje vile dočarava svu ljepotu Dalmacije i Mediterana. Na prvom katu vile, nalazi se dnevni prostor kojega čine velika kuhinja opremljena svim potrebnim aparatima, velika blagovaona te prostrani dnevni boravak . Dnevni prostor ima izlaz na veliku terasu, s prekrasnim pogledom na more. Na drugom katu vile nalaze se četiri spavaće sobe s vlastitim kupaonicama i pogledom na more i otoke. U svim sobama se nalazi klima i podno grijanje. Vila je opremljena dizajnerskim namještajem, rasvjetom i tepisima. Nalazi se u mirnom predgrađu Splita, u malom mjestu Kučine. Centar grada i Dioklecijanova palača udaljeni su 10 minuta vožnje automobilom. Kučine su poznate po usmenim predajama, prema kojima je tamo rođen rimski car i graditelj palače, Dioklecijan. Sagrađena je 2019.g. a materijali koji su se koristili u izgradnji vile su: sedreni kamen, slavonski hrast, porculan, mramor, granit i dr. Vila ima i parking za tri automobila. Par godina je u turističkom najmu, ima jako visoke ocjene i financijski je isplativa investicija. Cijena je na upit. Kupac plaća agencijsku proviziju. Za sve ostale informacije, kontaktirajte me na +385 91 534 9959 ili na mail: t.tomic@remax.hr (Tonka). Dodatne informacije o objektu, njegovoj točnoj lokaciji i razgledavanje mogući su nakon potpisivanja ugovora o posredovanju s Agencijom koji je u skladu sa Zakonom o zaštiti podataka i Zakonom o posredovanju u prometu nekretnina. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Split, surroundings, villa with pool and sea view NEW ON SALE !!! BUSINESS OPPORTUNITY!!! On a plot of 521 m2 there is a unique villa with a large pool and a beautiful view of Split, the sea and the islands. The floor area of the villa is 100 m2, and it spreads over three floors, ground floor, first and second floor (a total of 300 m2 of living space). On the ground floor of the villa (100 m2) there is a traditional tavern, bio sauna, equipped gym and entertainment room with billiards and darts. The tavern, with an indoor fireplace, was designed by Mr. Todorić, a famous Croatian interior designer and painter, and the tavern also houses his painting "Playful Horses". The gym and tavern have access to a large terrace by the pool. The pool has an area of 40 m2 and a unique and special design, and it is surrounded on one side by a seating area adorned with a Bacchus mural, then on the other wall a large wall painting of Poseidon, and on the south a sun deck overlooking the sea and islands. The environment is planted with various Mediterranean plants and palm trees, there is also an outdoor barbecue, so the environment of the villa evokes all the beauty of Dalmatia and the Mediterranean. On the first floor of the villa, there is a living room consisting of a large kitchen equipped with all necessary appliances, a large dining room and a spacious living room. The living area has access to a large terrace, with beautiful sea views. On the second floor of the villa there are four bedrooms with private bathrooms and views of the sea and islands. All rooms have air conditioning and underfloor heating. The villa is equipped with designer furniture, lighting and carpets. It is located in a quiet suburb of Split, in the small town of Kučine. The city center and Diocletian's Palace are a 10-minute drive away. It was built in 2019. and the materials used in the construction of the villa are: travertine stone, Slavonian oak, porcelain, marble, granite, etc. The villa also has parking for three cars. He has been on a tourist rental for a couple of years, has very high ratings and is a financially viable investment. The price is on request. The buyer pays an agency commission. For all other information, contact me on +385 91 534 9959 or e-mail: t.tomic@remax.hr (Tonka). Additional information about the facility, its exact location and sightseeing is possible after signing a brokerage agreement with the Agency in accordance with the Data Protection Act and the Real Estate Brokerage Act.
Grijanje: Sustav grijanja: Etažno centralno na struju
